result.name: farn-deeps-nephrops-2003-04-fisheries-science-partnership
result.notes:
Two-trawl survey of the Farn Deeps *Nephrops* (*Nephrops**norvegicus*
) ground, located off the north-east coast of England, undertaken in March, 
November and December 2004. The aims of the survey were to describe the 
composition of the *Nephrops* population in the vicinity of Cefas 
underwater camera survey stations, and to describe the variability of 
commercial catch rates of *Nephrops* and by-catch species according to 
location, vessel and time.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
